message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  I think it would be very valuable for you.  To get us started, I'm proposing a price of $14,000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob. I understand your perspective.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? I believe this reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go to $13,000. How about we try $12,200?
